name: Publishers.Count
desc: A publisher that publishes the number of elements received from the upstream publisher.

items.name: init(upstream: Upstream)
items.desc: Creates a publisher that publishes the number of elements received from the upstream publisher.

items.name: typealias Output
items.desc: The kind of values published by this publisher.

items.name: typealias Failure
items.desc: The kind of errors this publisher might publish.

items.name: let upstream: Upstream
items.desc: The publisher from which this publisher receives elements.

items.name: static func == (Publishers.Count<Upstream>, Publishers.Count<Upstream>) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two publishers are equivalent. /// - Parameters:
